title: Important Vegetation Details
content1: The municipality has plant species including sal, sallo, bamboo, chilaune, teak, neem, thakal, simal, amala, bhalayo, badahar, chiuri, jamun, salla, kimbu, aiselu, katus, karam, saj, sal, sisau, and khayar.
heading: Details of Medicinal Plants
content2: Medicinal plants such as harro, barro, amala, kurilo, sarpagandha, angeri, tulsi, gurjo, bhui amala, dalchini, chiraito, and sisno are found in the forest area of the municipality. There seems to be ample possibility of collection and sale of these medicinal plants.
